mapper.insert: insert into member(user_id, password, address, user_tel, user_name, nickname,email) values(#{userId},#{password},#{address},#{userTel},#{userName},#{nickName},#{email})
mapper.select: select * from member where user_id=#{userId} and password=#{password}
mapper.update: update member set password=#{password},address=#{address} ,user_tel=#{userTel},user_name=#{userName},nickname=#{nickName},email=#{email} where user_id=#{userId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM(SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_ID=#{userId}) MEMBER WHERE PASSWORD=#{password}
